title: I'd Clean Out My ClosetJustto Make Space for These 20 NET-A-PORTER Arrivals
text: While I'm not a proponent of throwing out your wardrobe and starting from scratch, I'd be lying if I said I didn't fantasize about it on my worst days. I'm not immune to the temptation that is a new arrivals page on my favorite retailers' websites, especially when it's NET-A-PORTER. If I ever win the lottery, you know where I'll be: surrounded by the Agolde jeans, Alaïa bags, and Khaite shoes I've shopped out for you below. These spring arrivals are playing into every trend I want to embrace: deep-burgundy and butter-yellow hues, slimmer (but not skinny) denim, flouncy blouses, and suede bags. To see what my spring dreams are made of, keep scrolling. JACQUEMUS La Casquette Gelato Appliquéd Slub Cotton and Corduroy Baseball Cap PROENZA SCHOULER Finch Belted Coated Cotton-Blend Jacket LOEWE Printed Cotton-Blend Jersey T-Shirt AGOLDE Henson Mid-Rise Straight-Leg Jeans LOEFFLER RANDALL Leonie Bow-Embellished Suede Ballet Flats ALAÏA Le Teckel Textured-Leather Shoulder Bag BODE Claret Off-the-Shoulder Ruffled Pointelle-Trimmed Hammered-Silk Blouse TOTEME Mid-Rise Straight-Leg Organic Jeans SAINT LAURENT Le Loafer Glossed-Eel Slippers LOEWE Pebble Embellished Leather Bucket Bag DRIES VAN NOTEN Striped Cotton Halterneck Top AEYDE Betty Leather Ballet Flats PROENZA SCHOULER Keegan Gathered Crepe De Chine Top JACQUEMUS Capri Cropped Stretch-Crepe Slim-Leg Pants KHAITE Mia Snake-Effect Leather Pumps LA LIGNE Val Cropped Denim Jacket AJE Chant Crochet-Trimmed Cotton-Voile Maxi Skirt KHAITE Elena Medium Studded Suede Shoulder Bag ADIDAS ORIGINALS Tokyo Leather-Trimmed Suede Sneakers Terms and conditions apply.
html:
While I'm not a proponent of throwing out your wardrobe and starting from scratch, I'd be lying if I said I didn't fantasize about it on my worst days. I'm not immune to the temptation that is a new arrivals page on my favorite retailers' websites, especially when it's NET-A-PORTER. If I ever win the lottery, you know where I'll be: surrounded by the Agolde jeans, Alaïa bags, and Khaite shoes I've shopped out for you below. These spring arrivals are playing into every trend I want to embrace: deep-burgundy and butter-yellow hues, slimmer (but not skinny) denim, flouncy blouses, and suede bags. To see what my spring dreams are made of, keep scrolling.
